summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 KEYSTONE SPRINGDALE TRAVEL TRAILER EQUIPPED WITH CARLISLE SPORT TRAIL TIRES, SIZE 225/75R15. THE CONTACT WAS DRIVING 60 MPH WHEN THE TREAD ON THE DRIVER SIDE TIRE SUDDENLY SEPARATED. THE CONTACT PULLED OVER AND REPLACED THE DEFECTIVE TIRE WITH A SPARE. THE TIRES WERE NOT INSPECTED OR REPAIRED. THE CONTACT HAD NOT NOTICED ANY PRIOR ISSUES WITH THE TIRES BEFORE THE FAILURE AND THE TIRE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE VIN WAS UNAVAILABLE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS NOT AVAILABLE.  UPDATED 06/17/11*LJ
